itemInfo.itemDesc:
A fine flour made by Grinding.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Grinding Sweet Potatoes.

- Usage: Essence of Liquor, Meat Stew, Oatmeal, etc.

item.name: Sweet Potato
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by a variety of methods.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Shuri Farm. It can also be obtained by Farming Sweet Potato Seeds using a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, Vinegar, etc.

item.name: High-Quality Sweet Potato
item.desc:
A Cooking ingredient that was produced through Farming.
- How to Obtain: Seeds can be obtained through Plant Breeding in a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, etc.

item.name: Special Sweet Potato
item.desc:
A Cooking ingredient that was produced through Farming.
- How to Obtain: Seeds can be obtained through Plant Breeding in a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, etc.

item.name: Sweet Potato Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Sweet Potato Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.
